title: How the fuck do i improve my RANK GAMEPLAY WHEN IM FUCKING CONSISTENTLY STUCK WITH FEEDERS
body:
How do i play a game where i cant improve in but continously lose cause of people who ruin the game and dont want to play its starting to get fucking annoying loss after loss after loss how can i keep playing the game ive given 110% every game but it dosent work i win 1 game hooray but then lose another another 10 in a row my mmr is really fucken bad and i get put with iron people which i try my best in but when we get 1 death the whole fucken team wants to feed and then gap it how do i improve in this circumstances isnt it meant to be where riot continously fucken punishes me from climbing or does match making deliberetely put me with afks trolls intent cause of my mmr EVEN A FUCKEN PRO CANT GET OUT OF MY DILEMNA so fucking annoying every time 

Norbit1234

replies.body:
"Even a fucking pro can't get out of your Dilemma" lol

i have diamond/master friends who (because of ridiculous queue times) create separate accounts, int their provis games and climb from Iron to Plat in 1 day, you're MMR is bad, because you keep blaming your team and then you complain about it like it will make a difference

**Let me role play this so you understand where you stand if this was work.**

Mr Norbit1234. I've been getting reports of you complaining about your co-workers. Having seen the statistics of your career's history in this role and all the inadequacies that come with it, not including your co-workers involvement, my evaluation of your record is that of incompetence. 

https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=NORBIT1234

* You've been consistently failing to outperform lower ranking competitors "that are 2-3 levels bellow you" in the majority of your matches.
* You dont have any optimal build path for most of the champs you play to enhance effectiveness.
* You have 5years+ of experience and failed to out compete people that just started out this year, or in the recent time frame of 1-2years. "Let me make a side note and remind you that the iron equivalent of league in education, is that of a primary school student's qualification and knowledge". To emphasis the fact that you are unable to use your 5years+ worth of accumulated knowledge to get an edge, is simply appalling.

It is plain as day from taking all these points into consideration that you are not qualify for this job and your attitude is damning to the rest of the team. Your dismissal is effective immediately, you have 1 hour to pack your belonging and i wish you well on finding a different career better suited to your **aptitude**. 

--------------

Complains all you like and ignored your own mistakes. Once you land a job, all of these habits you've developed, or innately; Wont do you any good. 

I and most HR departments personnel would not hire you at all judging on your personality and comprehension, if you were to apply for a role that need any more than 88IQs+. Because you can't learn it effectively and will most likely output poor performances, without, or slow, improvement.

It has been proven by science that increasing IQs in a person take LOTS, AND LOTS of resources for a minuscule grow. 

You don't have the resources and are aiming too high for what you can do... So be happy with the hand you are dealt, or forever live in misery.

Not really aiming too high all im going for now is game by game but even that is failing all i want is to play 1 fair game watch one of my games and you will understand the hardship of accomplishing a goal where winning is the inevitable and it will be certain pain and anguish with deal with these fucktards all i want is 1 FAIR GAME is it so hard to ask or am i wasting my time

>** Not really aiming too high** 

Every person who said that while showing no progress time and time again are delusional.

Please take a hint and read between the line. I can't be any more clearer without getting ban. The 1st message said it all.

So what are you trying to say cause i dont understand what your trying to interpret please make the message more understandle for me to read 

All im trying to state is i want a to have a clean 5 v 5 instead of kids complaining all the time miss the good old days season 2 and 3 were the best yet riot does not understand the complexity of what fucking making the game fair for others instead of ruining the game for old veterans who continue to support and play the game

Demons just baiting you because he's a troll. 
A summery for his logic is "You deserve inters, afks's, and trolls because you're bad and your elo shows it"

Ignore him, he doesn't really play the game man.
